sentences.en: Before you invest in anything, you should familiarise yourself with the instruments and their risks.
sentences.cn: 投资任何东西前, 你应该对它和其风险有足够的认识.

sentences.en: Here again, of course, you can always try some practice tests to familiarise yourself with the format.
sentences.cn: 当然,为了熟悉考试形式你也可以做一些测试练习。

sentences.en: I began to familiarise myself with my new body: the grill, the bread bin, the speaker and the spring mechanism.
sentences.cn: 我开始熟悉自己的新身体：烤盘、面包箱、话筒和弹簧装置。

sentences.en: I was expected to familiarise myself with the keyboard.
sentences.cn: 对我的要求是熟悉键盘。

sentences.en: The reason you want to familiarise yourself with the camera is that when you read the manual and it refers to a button with a star and moon you will know where it is.
sentences.cn: 要熟悉相机的理由是，当你阅读说明书时，对上面提到的按键你都知道在哪里。

trans.tran_cn: 使熟悉， 使通晓； 使家喻户晓
